title: Rutledge Wood! (Re-upload)
description:
Rutledge Wood is well known in the car world. He's been a fixture of NASCAR broadcasts, covering it for CMT, SPEED TV, and hosting numerous shows and events. He was also a co-host on Top Gear USA. But he's more than a mouth. He knows how to build and restore cars, has a crazy collection, and even won the 2013 Long Beach Toyota Celebrity Race, winning in the Pro category.

https://therutledgewood.com/

Check out Rutt's new show! https://www.history.com/shows/lost-in-transmission

Follow us! T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @ruttledgewood
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
